text:
Created attachment 24281
Snapshot 

Hi,

I have a requirement to move files to a remote directory. I am using SCP task
to implement the requirement. Problem is When I move a single file SCP is
copying file to remote directory successfully with message build as success.
When I trying to move files scp is copying files but target is not getting
completed and it is keep on running.
creator: vidyasagar_atikam@yahoo.in

text:
this could be a duplicate of bug 41090

Which version of jsch are you using?
creator: bodewig@apache.org
vidyasagar_atikam@yahoo.in
text:
You are right.. problem got resolved.
It's all because of incorrect jsch.jar version. 

Thanks for reply.
Vidya

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 41090 ***
